Package gw.api.web.payment

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AllocationStrategy
    Interface for a Payment Distribution allocation strategy, which determines how to distribute some amount of funds across a set of Distribution Items (BaseDistItem).
    ReturnPremiumAllocationStrategy
    Implementing this interface means creating a new credit allocation strategy to be associated with a TypeKey in ReturnPremiumAllocateMethod.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AllocateCreditsDistributionStrategy
    Allocate the credits to pay off the positive items.
    AllocateCreditsNewestFirstDistributionStrategy
    This is Credit Allocation Strategy distributes to charges from newest to the oldest.
    AllocationPool
    Funds to be allocated against a set of invoice items (gross and commission).
    AllZeroDistributionStrategy  
    DBPaymentDistItemGroup
    A group of a payment's distribution items for the New Direct Bill Payment Screen.
    DBPaymentDistItemsForCustomGroup
    A group of distribution items on the same Custom Group for the New Direct Bill Payment Screen
    DBPaymentDistItemsForInvoice
    A group of distribution items on the same Invoice for the New Direct Bill Payment Screen
    DBPaymentDistItemsForTAccountOwner
    A group of payment distribution items that have the same TAccountOwner for the New Direct Bill Payment Screen
    DirectBillDistributionStrategy
    These distribution strategies only support DirectBill Payments
    DirectBillPaymentFactory
    The place to go when you want to pay Direct Bill invoice items.
    DirectBillPaymentView
    View class for direct bill payments to handle non persistent UI work
    DistributionStrategy  
    InvoiceItemAllocation
    This class is returned by a scriptable method.
    ModifyingDirectBillPaymentView  
    MoveDirectBillPaymentView
    View Helper for moving direct bill payments
    PaymentInstrumentFactory
    Provides access to the singleton PaymentInstrument types.
    PaymentRequestFilters
    Filters for PaymentRequest
    PaymentRequestFilters.All
    A filter to return all PaymentRequests
    PaymentRequestFilters.AllOpen
    A filter to return all PaymentRequests which are neither cancelled nor closed
    PaymentRequestFilters.Last30Days
    A filter to return PaymentRequests which were closed within the last 30 days cancelled nor closed
    PaymentRequestFilters.SentRange
    A filter to return PaymentRequests sent within x number of days.
    ProRataDistributionStrategy  
    ProRataRedistributionStrategy
    Class to determine the priority algorithm to redistribute excess funds towards a list of dist items.
    ProRataReversedPaymentAmountRedistributionStrategy
    Class to determine the priority algorithm to redistribute reversed payment amount towards a list of dist items.
    SuspensePaymentFilterSet
    Filters for SuspensePayment list view
    SuspensePaymentUtil  
    SuspPymtStatusFilterSet
    Filters for Suspense Payment screens, for Suspense Payment Status.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PayableTAccountOwners
    PayableTAccountOwners are the TAccountOwners that can be paid by the direct bill payment screen.
    ProRataDistributionStrategy.MONEY_TYPE  
    WhenModifyingDirectBillMoney
